div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Feb. 5, 1914. THE SWEDISH-AMERICAN LEAGUE OF HYDE PARK

body.p: "The Swedish-American League of Hyde Park" is the name of a new organization, founded last week at 5487 Lake Avenue, and with a membership of fifty. Officers are: chairman: Theodore Rolfe; secretary: John E. Anderson; treasurer: Oscar Lavin. The society is partly political, and partly social, and will be glad to assist countrymen when they intend to take out papers for citizenship. The society will also support any countrymen who are candidates for political offices.
